items.sentence: The governor stayed Tom Jackson's execution after new evidence came to light.
Nothing makes us age more quickly than the thought that we're ageing quickly.
Tom got a dog for his birthday, but he hasn't yet made up his mind on a name.
I promised myself I'd make Tom laugh at least once before the end of the day.
Tom didn't buy the ring that he gave to Mary. He got it from his grandmother.
Tom and Mary sold everything, bought an old farm and started raising alpacas.
The amplification of DNA via PCR is a necessary step for many kinds of tests.
Mary brought her truck to the dynamometer, hoping to show off its horsepower.
Put all the stuff you don't want in this box, and I'll get rid of it for you.
Emergency rooms are experiencing a surge in admissions due to gunshot wounds.
